Texto: 
bilateral neck masses
enhancing soft tissue mass lesions within the visualized mediastinum and neck.
sarcoidosis
lymphoma
granulomatous disease
metastatic disease
neurofibroma
angiofibroma
35 y/o aam with persistent nodules in chin and cheek for many months.us appearance favors lymph nodes; however, angiofibroma, neurofibroma, etc could also have a similiar appearance.
